location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government, Public Department, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication sent to him by Philip Henry Bridges, Captain of HM Sloop Challenger, dated 17 April 1817, informing him that the East India Company cannot issue clothing to the crews of Government ships.
